title: [Grawood Farmstead, Path]
description: Rising from the fences lining the road, an archway constructed of woven willow branches and bedecked with streaming cotton ribbons and fresh flowers greets those heading into town.  From the peak of the arch, a glass lantern with panes of blue, red, yellow, and green dangles, the hues illuminated from within by a candle that flickers fitfully from time to time.

Rising from the fences lining the road, an archway constructed of woven willow branches and bedecked with streaming cotton ribbons and fresh flowers greets those heading into town.  From the peak of the arch, a glass lantern with panes of blue, red, yellow, and green dangles unlit.
